name: **Donee**
description: Donee L748-662 Sheet 37 Donee (or Doonee) is located W of Inishbearna and is easily recognised by its tower on the summit, tiled white to seaward. With a similar tower on Inishbearna Island, also unmarked on the OS map, at L759-659, it forms a transit for safe passage for larger craft through the reefs S of Inishdegil. Landing is possible on the NE side and is best in mid to HW as there is a gap through which one can paddle / surf. Hummocky Sea Thrift.
